PositiveConnections_GiftMessage.rulePack.li: giftMessage->[initiator_nameDef] handed [giftDescription] to [recipient_nameDef] as a present.

giftMessage->[initiator_nameDef] made [recipient_nameDef] smile by giving them [giftDescription].
